rules.title: Question?
rules.body: Everything you say must end in a question mark? With an upward inflection?

rules.title: Foreigner
rules.body: You must speak in an accent.

rules.title: Medusa
rules.body: You cannot make eye contact with anyone.

rules.title: Narcissus
rules.body: Everyone (including yourself) must compliment you before they drink.

rules.title: Head Lice
rules.body: You cannot touch your head

rules.title: Choo Choo
rules.body: You must pump your arms back and forth like the spokes on a train every time you laugh.

rules.title: Middle Man
rules.body: You cannot address anyone directly.

rules.title: #YOLO
rules.body: Every sentence must begin with 'Yo,'

rules.title: The Ke$ha Rule Rule
rules.body: You must repeat the last word of every sentence sentence.

rules.title: Buffalo
rules.body: You cannot drink with your dominant hand.

rules.title: Double Fist
rules.body: You must drink with two hands.

rules.title: Back Problems
rules.body: Your head must be below another player's at all times.

rules.title: Toothless
rules.body: You cannot reveal your teeth.

rules.title: Caveman
rules.body: You may not use words more than one syllable.

rules.title: Sainted
rules.body: You are to be referred to as a Saint.

rules.title: Knighted
rules.body: You are to be referred to as Sir or Dame.

rules.title: Foul Mouth
rules.body: You must curse in every sentence.

rules.title: Bad at Names
rules.body: You must avoid mentioning anyone's name.

rules.title: Liquid Cooled
rules.body: The floor is lava. Drink constantly while touching it.

rules.title: CB Radio
rules.body: Every sentence must end with 'Over'

rules.title: Touchy Feely
rules.body: You must remain in physical contact with another player at all times.

rules.title: Angry Man
rules.body: You must insult another player every time you drink.

rules.title: DJ Salute
rules.body: You must salute any time the song changes.

rules.title: Penguin Gloves
rules.body: You must hold your hands flat like flippers.

rules.title: Mr Hat
rules.body: You must wear a hat, or a hat-like device, on your head.

rules.title: Buddy System
rules.body: Choose another person. Every time they drink, you do too.

rules.title: Nudist
rules.body: Undress until you are tied for the least clothing at the party.

rules.title: Cotton Fists
rules.body: Wrap a piece of clothing around your hand. This counts as you wearing it.

rules.title: Trump Hands
rules.body: You may only use your index and pointer finger to grab things.

rules.title: Trumpets
rules.body: When someone mentions the name of a country, raise your drink. The last person to raise must finish it.

rules.title: Party of Dogs
rules.body: You cannot stand up.

rules.title: Consumer
rules.body: You cannot say any variation of the word 'Drink'.

rules.title: Helicopter
rules.body: You cannot raise your hands above your head.

rules.title: Doesn't Count
rules.body: You cannot say numbers.

rules.title: Tone Deaf
rules.body: You cannot sing.

rules.title: Nicknames
rules.body: Make up nicknames for the other players. You cannot call them by their real names.

rules.title: Licktator
rules.body: Lick a card and stick it to your forehead. As long as it remains there, you are immune from rules.

rules.title: Neck Brace
rules.body: You cannot rotate your head.

rules.title: Memento
rules.body: If you swear, write the word on yourself in sharpie.

rules.title: Stare-off
rules.body: If you lock eyes, you must have a staring contest. The loser finishes their drink.

rules.title: Gender-Swap
rules.body: Everyone must go by the closest opposite-gendered version of their name.

rules.title: Little Man
rules.body: There is an imaginary man on your drink. You must remove him before drinking each time, else finish your drink.

rules.title: King of Beers
rules.body: Place a bottle cap on your head like a crown. If it falls, drink and put it back.

rules.title: Ahoy
rules.body: Everyone must talk like a pirate.

rules.title: Name Troll
rules.body: You cannot talk to someone without first saying their name.

rules.title: Gecko
rules.body: Everyone must place three limbs against a vertical surface. The last person to comply must finish their drink.

rules.title: Heaven
rules.body: Everyone must raise their hands to the air. The last person to do so must drink.

rules.title: Thumbmaster
rules.body: Everyone must place their thumbs on the table. The last person to do so much drink.

rules.title: Moose
rules.body: Everyone must place their hands beside their head like antlers. The last person to do so must drink.

rules.title: Viking
rules.body: Place your hands like horns on a viking helmet, and everyone else must start rowing. The last person to row takes a drink.

rules.title: Mimic
rules.body: Assume a pose. Everyone who doesn't copy you must take a drink.

rules.title: Waterfall
rules.body: Everyone starts drinking. Do not stop until someone finishes their drink.

rules.title: Duel
rules.body: Two people turn away from their drinks. On the count of three, spin around and take a drink. Whoever is slowest must finish theirs.

rules.title: Moo-off
rules.body: Two people get on hands and knees and make cow noises at each other. The first to laugh must finish their drink.

rules.title: NSA Alert
rules.body: Take a drink for every camera in the room.

rules.title: Categories
rules.body: Pick a word. In a circle, everyone else must name something that relates to it. The first to mess up or take too long must drink.

rules.title: Rhyme Time
rules.body: Pick a word. In a circle, everyone else must name something that rhymes with it. The first to mess up or take too long must drink.

rules.title: Wordplay
rules.body: Pick a word. In a circle, everyone else must name something that starts with the same letter as it. The first to mess up or take too long must drink.

rules.title: I Never
rules.body: Name something you've never done. Anyone who has done it must drink.

rules.title: I Have
rules.body: Name something you have done. Anyone who hasn't must drink.

rules.title: I Like
rules.body: Name something you enjoy. Anyone who doesn't must drink.

rules.title: I Hate
rules.body: Name something you don't like. Anyone who likes it must drink.

rules.title: 6 Degrees
rules.body: Choose an actor. The next player must name a movie that actor was in. The player after must name a different actor who was in that movie. Continue, and the first person to mess up or take too long must drink.

rules.title: Spin The Bottle
rules.body: Spin a bottle. Whoever it lands on must drink.

rules.title: Coin Flip
rules.body: Flip a coin. Anyone who calls incorrectly must drink.

rules.title: SURPRISE
rules.body: Take a drink.

rules.title: BACKFIRE
rules.body: Take a drink.

rules.title: Election
rules.body: Everyone must point at another player. Whoever is pointed at the most must drink.

rules.title: Duck Hunt
rules.body: Mime shooting another player. If they dodge, take a drink. If you hit, they must finish their drink.

rules.title: Communism
rules.body: Everyone must take a drink from the cup with the most liquid in it.

rules.title: Jäger Master
rules.body: Drop a shot in your cup and finish your drink.

rules.title: WinZip
rules.body: Everyone must unzip their pants. If they cannot, for any reason, they must take a drink.

rules.title: Sharing's Caring
rules.body: Take a sip from every player's drink.

rules.title: Carpé Diem
rules.body: Take a drink.

rules.title: Twofer
rules.body: Take 2 drinks.

rules.title: Hat Trick
rules.body: Take 3 drinks.

rules.title: Chain Drink
rules.body: Point at another player. That player must point at someone else. Repeat until someone is picked twice, and then every player in the chain must drink.

rules.title: Irish Standoff
rules.body: Give a drink to another player. When they finish, they may give a drink back to you. Repeat until one of you opts out of returning the drink.

rules.title: Long Pour
rules.body: Have another player pour a sip into your mouth from several inches away.

rules.title: Pick a Mate
rules.body: Choose another player to take a drink with you.

rules.title: Sausage Party
rules.body: All guys take a drink.

rules.title: Femme Fatale
rules.body: All girls take a drink.

rules.title: Rock Paper Scissors
rules.body: Everyone throws in. Everyone drinks for anyone who beats them.

rules.title: Charity Case
rules.body: Everyone may choose to give you a drink, but they must take one as well.

rules.title: Phone a Friend
rules.body: Pick another player. They decide if you take a drink or a shot.

rules.title: Tribes
rules.body: Every player with the same coloured shirt as you must drink.

rules.title: Declone
rules.body: Remove a piece of clothing you normally wear two of.

rules.title: Undo
rules.body: Remove a piece of clothing.

rules.title: Redo
rules.body: Put on a piece of clothing.

rules.title: Export
rules.body: Take off a piece of clothing and choose another player to wear it.

rules.title: Import
rules.body: Choose another player. They must take off a piece of clothing and give it to you to wear.

rules.title: War Face
rules.body: Make a war face, and then finish your drink.

rules.title: Greetings
rules.body: Kiss another player. If they refuse, take a drink. If you refuse, finish your drink.
